message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
I appreciate the offer Alice, but I think a 55/45 split is more reflective of the situation given the inflation rates. This offer is better for you in round 2 than my offer would be in round 3.
Considering the inflation, my 58-42 offer is more generous than it seems. Think about the future rounds, Bob.
Alice, your offers are getting better, but the clock is ticking for both of us. This offer is a good compromise to end this quickly and fairly.
